thread.title: BCT Ranks 1st in Print Solutions Magazine Digital Printing Category
thread.title_full: BCT Ranks 1st in Print Solutions Magazine Digital Printing Category - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: BCT Ranks 1st in Print Solutions Magazine Digital Printing Category
text:
BCT Ranks 1st in Digital Printing and 2nd in Offset Printing categories in Print Solutions Magazine Annual Top Trade Printers edition.
Fort Lauderdale, FL (PRWEB) September 25, 2015
Print Solutions Magazine, a leading publication serving Print Brokers and Distributors, released the 2015 results for their annual “Best of the Best -Top Trade Printers” edition. Based on annual sales volume, BCT scored high marks in several categories including: 1st in Digital Printing, 2nd in Offset Printing, 3rd in Letterhead, Envelopes and Business Cards, and 3rd Overall.
BCT’s President Peter Posk stated “We’ve remained true to who we are – wholesale only – and to our core strengths, fast turn, outstanding personal service and great technology. Our distributors value those things.”
“In January of this year orderprinting.com, our web2print solution for corporate identity print products, surpassed 10 million orders processed” Posk said. Over 40% of Fortune 1000 companies use our software solutions. We are also integrated with many third party W2P solutions. We make it easy for our distributors and their customers to do business with us.”
Lisa Teague, who owns the BCT in Akron along with her husband Randy, services the state of Ohio and city of Detroit. Lisa offered “It’s very exciting to be honored as a Top Trade Printer by Print Solutions Magazine! We continue to stay abreast of changes in our industry and expand our products by offering the unique finishes, heavy weight stock and painted edge business cards that our distributors are looking for. But I believe what sets us apart is Orderprinting.com! Our real value is simplifying and streamlining the order process and this is what our distributors and their customers love!”
You can contact your nearest BCT by visiting http://www.bctonline.net and using our plant locator.
About BCT:
BCT is the largest wholesale stationery printer in North America. Founded in 1975, BCT's 35 production centers throughout the United States and Canada are your wholesale only source for high quality printing of Full Color & Spot Business Cards, Stationery, Postcards, Catalog Sheets, Thermography & Flat Business Cards, Stationery, Custom Stamps, Custom Labels, Booklets and Finishing Services. BCT is the developer and owner of orderprinting.com® and printdesigner.comTM, two software applications for the commercial and retail reseller markets. BCT also owns Pelican Paper ( http://www.pelicanpaper.com ), a paper converter, distributor, and supplier of fine papers to the print industry. Additional information about BCT is available at: http://www.bctonline.net .
